Live Streaming events for the week

Funeral Mass for Maria A. Herrera

Upcoming events/Announcement

PARISH PICNIC

We are thrilled to announce the date of our Church and School Picnic.

Sunday, September 8th, 11:30-3:00.

Food tent, Beer Garden, Music, Jump houses, Dunk Tank, Face painting and family fun for all. Invite your friends to our cookout!

Special blessing for all children during the 10:30am mass.

Volunteers are needed to help run the event, please consider and sign up here > Picnic Volunteer Sign up

All proceeds will go directly toward our Captial Projects Fund. Credit Cards will be accepted for all food and beverage purchases.

August 17th is the Diocesan Day of Service. Please consider giving of your time to help throughout the diocese.

1st Friday Devotions- The year of Eucharistic Revival in the Parish

The Pearl of Great Price- Cardinal Dolan

Come away to a peaceful place at St. John the Baptist Church, apart from the hustle and bustle of daily life. Eucharistic Adoration offers every individual silent time with our risen Lord. Bring you worries, your concerns, your sorrows and your joys before Jesus in the Blessed Sacrament.

_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Please visit our Social Media sites listed below for a library of our streamed mass and prayer services. Also available on the News and Events Tab/Liturgical Support.

St John the Baptist Facebook Page

St John the Baptist You Tube Channel

Diocesan information can be found under the News and Events Tab/Diocesan Resource Tab.

Indiana bishops extend Sunday Mass dispensation for those who are unable to attend in person due to age or sickness. Please read the attached letter.
